anya-e0803n4:19_0: Okāse sattamī sāpi, bhinnā dvedhā smiṁsu iti;

anya-e0803n4:24_0: Kubbate yena vā tantu, karaṇaṁ iti saññitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:25_0: Deti rocati vā yassa, sampadānanti taṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0803n4:26_0: Yatopeti bhayaṁ vā taṁ, apādānanti kittitaṁ.

anya-e0803n4:31_0: Vinā ālapanatthaṁ liṅgatthādīsu paṭhamādivibhattuppatti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.

anya-e0803n4:60_0: O, ā, bindu, i, ī, u, ū-antime sattadhā ṭhitā;
anya-e0803n4:62_0: Ā ivaṇṇo cuvaṇṇo ca, pañca antā sarūpato;
anya-e0803n4:64_0: Bindu, i, u-ime antā, tayo ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
anya-e0803n4:66_0: Antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṁ pañca vā cha vā;
anya-e0803n4:67_0: Napuṁsake tayo evaṁ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā.
anya-e0803n4:68_0: Yasmā panettha ‘‘bhūto’’tiādayo saddā nibbacanābhidheyyakathanatthasādhakavacanapariyāyavacanatthuddhāravasena vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā imesaṁ nibbacanādīni yathāsambhavaṁ vakkhāma viññūnaṁ tuṭṭhijananatthañceva sotārānamatthesu paṭutarabuddhipaṭilābhāya ca.
anya-e0803n4:68_1: Tatra bhūtoti khandhapātubhāvena bhavatīti bhūto, idaṁ tāva nibbacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_2: ‘‘Bhūto’’ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena satto vuccati, idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ. ‘‘Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto.
anya-e0803n4:68_3: Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya’’nti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_4: Atha vā bhūtoti evaṁnāmako amanussajātiyo sattaviseso, idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_5: ‘‘Bhūtavijjā, bhūtavejjo, bhūtaviggahito’’ti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_6: Yañca pana ‘‘satto macco pajā’’tiādikaṁ tattha tattha āgataṁ vacanaṁ, idaṁ sattoti atthavācakassa bhūtasaddassa pariyāyavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_7: Yañca niddesapāḷiyaṁ ‘‘maccoti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jagu jantu hindagu manujo’’ti āgataṁ, idampi pariyāyavacanameva.
anya-e0803n4:69_0: Satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo;
anya-e0803n4:70_0: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n4:71_0: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;
anya-e0803n4:73_0: Pajāti itthiyaṁ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato;
anya-e0803n4:75_0: Yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha;
anya-e0803n4:77_0: Imasmiṁ pakaraṇe ‘‘pariyāyavacana’’nti ca ‘‘abhidhāna’’nti ca ‘‘saṅkhā’’tiādīni ca ekatthāni adhippetāni, atthuddhāravasena pana bhūtasaddo pañcakkhandhāmanussadhātusassatavijjamānakhīṇāsavasattarukkhādīsu dissati, tappayogo upari atthattikavibhāge āvibhavissati.
anya-e0803n4:77_2: Yo bhāvanaṁ karoti, so bhāvako. Idamabhidheyyakathanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:77_5: Imāni ‘‘bhūto bhāvako’’ti dve padāni suddhakattuhetukattuvasena vuttānīti.
anya-e0803n4:77_6: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nibbacana’’nti ca ādīni avatvā katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ atthuddhārañca yathārahaṁ dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:77_7: Tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā, tasmā yesamattho uttāno, tesampi padānamabhidheyyaṁ na kathessāma, nibbacanamattameva nesaṁ kathessāma.
anya-e0803n4:77_8: Yesaṁ pana gambhīro attho, tesamabhidheyyaṁ kathessāma.
anya-e0803n4:78_1: Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā bhavanaṁ vaḍḍhananti katvā.
anya-e0803n4:78_2: ‘‘Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño’’ti idaṁ vuddhiatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:78_4: ‘‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’’ti hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi, tasmā bhavadiṭṭhī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:78_5: Tathā bhavoti bhavadiṭṭhi, bhavati sassataṁ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma.
anya-e0803n4:78_8: Etthāyaṁ pāḷivacanattho – ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṁ saṁsāravisuddhiṁ kathayiṁsūti.
anya-e0803n4:78_9: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:78_11: Ettha panāyaṁ pāḷivacanattho – bhavoti sampatti, abhavoti vipatti.
anya-e0803n4:78_14: Bhavoti puññaṁ, abhavoti pāpaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ vītivattoti.
anya-e0803n4:79_2: Ettha pana khandhā ‘‘yo paññāyati, so sarūpaṁ labhatī’’ti katvā ‘‘bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṁ samudetī’’ti atthena vā ‘‘bhavā’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:79_3: Okāso pana ‘‘bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā’’ti atthena ‘‘bhavo’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:79_5: ‘‘Upādānapaccayā bhavo duvidhena atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:79_8: Etthūpapatti bhavatīti bhavo, kammaṁ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā ‘‘sukho buddhānamuppādo’’ti vutto.
anya-e0803n4:79_10: Atha vā bhāvanalakkhaṇattā bhāvetīti bhavo. Kiṁ bhāveti? Upapattiṁ.
anya-e0803n4:79_13: Atha vā ‘‘bhavapaccayā jātī’’ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:82_1: ‘‘Bhave dukkhaṁ bhavadukkhaṁ, bhave saṁsaranto’’ti imānetassatthassa sādhakāni vacanāni.
anya-e0803n4:82_3: Bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena .
anya-e0803n4:93_2: Hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetī’’ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica vatthudhammopi bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_4: ‘‘Accāhitaṁ kammaṁ karosi luddaṁ, bhāve ca te kusalaṁ natthi kiñcī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Kriyāpibhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_6: Apica bhāvoti sattavevacananti bhaṇanti, dhātu vā etaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:93_7: Tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_8: Tathā pana bhāvetīti bhāvo, kriyā tu bhavananti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_10: Apica bhāvarūpampi bhāvo, yaṁ itthibhāvo pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:93_11: Tatrāyaṁ vacanattho – ‘‘itthī’’ti vā ‘‘puriso’’ti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:96_0: Vuttañhetaṁ porāṇehi ‘‘itthiyā bhāvo itthibhāvo, itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo’’ti, tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo, pumāti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṁ samadhigantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:97_0: Abhāvoti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so? Suññatā natthitā.
anya-e0803n4:97_1: Sabhāvoti attano bhāvo sabhāvo, attano pakati iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:97_2: Atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṁ sati atthasambhave yo koci sarūpaṁ labhati, tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:97_3: ‘‘Sāmaññaṁ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ mata’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:97_4: Apica sabhāvoti salakkhaṇo paramatthadhammo. Kenaṭṭhena? Saha bhāvenāti atthena.
anya-e0803n4:97_5: Sabbhāvoti sataṁ bhāvo sabbhāvo, sappurisadhammo iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:98_0: Sambhavoti sambhavanaṁ sambhavo, sambhavanakriyā, yutti vā.
anya-e0803n4:98_1: Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati ‘‘sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n4:98_3: Yato hi yaṁ kiñci sambhavati, so sambhavo.
anya-e0803n4:98_4: Pabhavoti pabhavanaṁ pabhavo, acchinnatā, pabhavati etasmāti vā pabhavo.
anya-e0803n4:98_5: Yato hi yaṁ kiñci pabhavati, so pabhavo.
anya-e0803n4:98_6: Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:98_7: Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi, pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi, tasmā paccayatthaṁ vajjetvā bhinnatthāti gahetabbā, paccayatthena pana samānatthāti gahetabbā.
anya-e0803n4:98_8: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘paccayo hetu nidānaṁ kāraṇaṁ sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṁ, byañjanato nāna’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:102_1: Tāni sampadānasādhanena sattavidhāni bhavanti, taṁ pana uttari āvibhavissati ‘‘dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūtī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0803n4:102_2: Iccevaṁ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni honti, yāni ‘‘kārakānī’’tipi vuccati, ito aññaṁ sādhanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0803n4:102_3: Idha payogesvatthesu ca viññūnaṁ pāṭavatthaṁ sādhananāmaṁ pakāsitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_4: Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti, sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā honti, tasmā payogāsādhanamūlakā, attho ca payogamūlako.
anya-e0803n4:102_5: Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṁ katvā atthaṁ kathanasīlā ‘‘yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito’’ti evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu, aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_6: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nāma sādhana’’nti na vakkhāma, kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu viññūnaṁ bahumānuppādanatthañceva vividhavicittapāḷigatike vividhatthasāre jinavaravacane sotūnaṁ buddhivijambhanatthañca atthasādhakavacanāniyeva yathārahaṁ suttageyyaveyyākaraṇagāthādīsu tato tato āharitvā dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:103_1: ‘‘Pabhāvaṁ te na passāmi, yena tvaṁ mithilaṁ vaje’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:103_2: Anubhavoti anubhavanaṁ anubhavo, kiṁ taṁ? Paribhuñjanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:103_4: ‘‘Tejasaṅkhato ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:105_0: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n4:108_1: ‘‘Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_2: Parābhavoti parābhavanaṁ parābhavo, atha vā parābhavatīti parābhavo.
anya-e0803n4:108_4: Apica ‘‘dhammadessī parābhavo’’ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_5: Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṁ taṁ? Dhammadessitādi.
anya-e0803n4:108_6: ‘‘Paṭhamo so parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhavoti nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_7: Tañhi bhavato vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo, bhavassa ca taṁhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:108_8: Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:108_9: Vibhavasaddassa nibbānābhidhānatte ‘‘evaṁ bhave vijjamāne, vibhavo icchitabbako’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:109_0: Nibbānaṁ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṁ samaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:118_0: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_1: Tattha vināso vibhavanaṁ ucchijjanaṁ nassananti atthena vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:131_2: ‘‘Vibhavo sabbadhammānaṁ, ittheke sato sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapentī’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_5: Dhanaṁ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti sattā etenāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:131_6: ‘‘Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Idaṁ pana pariyāyavacanaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:132_0: Dhanaṁ saṁ vibhavo dabbaṁ, sāpateyyaṁ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n4:133_0: Oḍḍaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ sakaṁ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n4:134_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati ‘‘attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṁ na jāyatī’’ti gahaṇato vibhavoti.
anya-e0803n4:134_2: Vibhavataṇhāti hi ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya taṇhāya nāmaṁ. Ettha atthuddhāro vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:137_1: Āvibhāvoti āvibhavanaṁ āvibhāvo, ubhinnametesaṁ pākaṭatā iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:137_4: Sotthibhāvoti sotthibhavanaṁ sotthibhāvo, suvatthibhāvo sukhassa atthitā, atthato pana nibbhayatā nirupaddavatā eva.
anya-e0803n4:137_6: Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā suññatā. Okārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:138_0: Abhibhavatīti abhibhavitā, paraṁ abhibhavanto yo koci.
anya-e0803n4:138_1: Evaṁ paribhavitā, anubhavatīti anubhavitā, sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā anubhavanto yo koci. Evaṁ samanubhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:138_3: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’’tiādīsu ‘‘dātā’’ti padānaṁ kattuvācakānaṁ ‘‘amatassā’’tiādīhi padehi kammavācakehi chaṭṭhiyantehi saddhiṁ yojanā dissati, tathā imesampi padānaṁ ‘‘paccāmittassa abhibhavitā’’tiādinā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n4:139_3: Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:139_4: Atha vā yena saddhiṁ katheti, so ‘‘bhava’’nti vattabbo, ‘‘bhavaṁ kaccāyano. Bhavaṁ ānando.
anya-e0803n4:139_5: Maññe bhavaṁ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n4:139_6: Ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo, sammutiattheyevādaro kātabbo ‘‘saṅketavacanaṁ saccaṁ, lokasammutikāraṇa’’nti vacanato.
anya-e0803n4:139_7: Vohāravisayasmiñhi lokasammuti eva padhānā avilaṅghanīyā. Parābhavatīti parābhavaṁ. Evaṁ paribhavaṁ. Abhibhavaṁ. Anubhavaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:139_8: Pabhavati pahoti sakkotīti pabhavaṁ, pahonto yo koci.
anya-e0803n4:139_9: Na pabhavaṁ appabhavaṁ, ‘‘appabhava’’nti ca idaṁ jātake diṭṭhaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:141_0: Sohaṁ appabhavaṁ tattha, sākhaṁ hatthehi aggahi’’nti
anya-e0803n4:143_1: Siribhūtīti sobhāya ceva paññāpuññānañca adhivacanaṁ. Sā assa bhavatūti siribhūti.
anya-e0803n4:144_0: Bhāvīti bhavanasīlo bhāvī, bhavanadhammo bhāvī, bhavane sādhukārī bhāvī. Evaṁ vibhāvī. Sambhāvī. Paribhāvīti.
anya-e0803n4:144_1: Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:144_2: Ettha vidvā, vijjāgato, ñāṇītiādi pariyāyavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n4:145_0: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n4:146_0: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n4:147_0: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n4:148_0: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:149_0: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n4:152_0: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so?
anya-e0803n4:152_1: Antarena paropadesaṁ sāmaṁyeva sabbaṁ ñeyyadhammaṁ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṁ patto sakyamuni bhagavā. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:153_0: ‘‘Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n4:155_0: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n4:157_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro khandhasantāno sayambhū.
anya-e0803n4:157_1: So evaṁbhūto khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:157_2: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo?
anya-e0803n4:157_4: So ekapuggalo etarahi ‘‘sabbaññū, sugato’’tiādīhi yathābhuccaguṇādhigatanāmehi ca pasiddho, ‘‘gotamo ādiccabandhū’’ti gottato ca pasiddho, sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho, suddhodanimāyādevīsutoti mātāpitito ca pasiddho, siddhatthoti gahitanāmena ca pasiddho. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n4:158_0: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṁ varo;
anya-e0803n4:161_0: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n4:186_0: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n4:193_0: Nāmaṁ guṇehi nissitaṁ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n4:204_0: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṁpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:211_1: Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṁpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:212_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhūti evaṁpakārānaṁ idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṁ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso atthī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:212_1: Tanna, abhidhānānaṁ abhisaṅkharaṇīyānabhisaṅkharaṇīyavasena abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato.
anya-e0803n4:212_2: Tathā hi katthaci keci ‘‘sakyasīho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘sakyakesarī sakyamigādhipo’’tiādinā nānāvividhamabhidhānamabhisaṅkharonti, pāvacanepi hi ‘‘dviduggamavarahanutta’malatthā’’ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n4:212_4: ‘‘Sabbaññū’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘sabbadassāvī sabbadassī’’tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti, ‘‘sahassakkho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘dasasatalocano’’tiādīni abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:212_7: Pāvacanepi hi yaṁ padumaṁ, taṁ jalajaṁ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto ‘‘padumuttaranāmino’’ti vattabbaṭṭhāne ‘‘jalajuttaranāmino’’ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n4:213_1: Vuttañhetaṁ dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtena ‘‘buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ, vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti, tathā ‘‘bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ bhagavā’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:213_3: Na hi tāni abhidhānāni ceva ‘‘satthā sugato jino’’tiādīni ca aññaṁ kiñci abhidhānaṁ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni, nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n4:213_4: Tathā hi ‘‘buddho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_5: Tathā ‘‘bhagavā satthā sugato’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca ‘‘sampannabhago anusāsako sundaravacano’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_6: Evaṁ imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū’’tiādinā nayena punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā. Evamaññatrāpi nayo netabbo. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:215_0: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṁ dvidhā bhave’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:216_0: Pabhūti paraṁ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro.
anya-e0803n4:216_1: ‘‘Araññassa pabhū ayaṁ luddako’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:216_2: Abhibhūti abhibhavatīti abhibhū, asaññasatto. Kiṁ so abhibhavi? Cattāro khandhe arūpino.
anya-e0803n4:216_3: Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū.
anya-e0803n4:216_4: So ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṁ saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi, tadabhibhavanakiccaṁ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:216_5: Apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi sato tassa upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ yujjateva.
anya-e0803n4:216_6: Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ. Taṁ yathā? Kūlaṁ patitukāmaṁ, evaṁ loke. Sāsane pana –
anya-e0803n4:219_0: ‘‘Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṁ vippahāyā’’ti ca ‘‘phalaṁ toseti kassaka’’nti ca ādi.
anya-e0803n4:219_1: Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte ‘‘abhibhuṁ abhibhuto maññatī’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:219_2: Atha vā abhibhavatīti abhibhū, paresamabhibhavitā yo koci.
anya-e0803n4:219_4: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:219_5: Keci pana ‘‘abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n4:220_0: Vibhūti visesabhūtoti vibhū, ‘‘bhavasotaṁ sace buddho, tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:220_1: Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n4:225_0: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṁ vaṇṇaṁ, bhikkhāya maṁ upāgamī’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:226_1: Patibhūti patibhūtoti patibhū, ‘‘goṇassa patibhū’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_2: Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṁ amatamahānibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū, sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāppattabalavavipassanācittena samannāgato puggalo.
anya-e0803n4:226_4: Yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti, tehi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo gotrabhū’’ti, idamevettha atthasādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_6: So hi ‘‘samaṇo’’ti gottamattaṁ anubhavati vindati, na samaṇadhamme attani avijjamānattāti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati, ‘‘bhavissanti kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṁ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vatrabhūti sakko.
anya-e0803n4:226_7: So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṁ labhitvā aññe deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū.
anya-e0803n4:226_8: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṁ pattiatthampi gahetvā ‘‘vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṁ pattoti vatrabhū’’ti vuttaṁ, ‘‘vatranāmakaṁ vā asuraṁ abhibhavatīti vatrabhū’’ti ca, ‘‘vatrabhū jayataṁpitā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_9: Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:226_15: Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṁ nāmaṁ tathāgatasseva yujjati. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:232_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:232_1: Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto, bhūtoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto, bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako vā.
anya-e0803n4:232_2: Atha vā tathākārena bhavatīti bhūto, bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo koci, ettha yo bhūtasaddo saccattho, tassa ‘‘bhūtaṭṭho’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_3: Parābhūtoti parābhavīti parābhūto. Suṭṭhu bhūtoti sambhūto. Visesena bhūtoti vibhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_4: Vissuto bhūtoti vā vibhūto, ‘‘vibhūtārammaṇa’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_5: Vibhavīti vā vibhūto, vinaṭṭhoti attho, ‘‘rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Pākaṭo bhūtoti pātubhūto. Āvi bhavatīti āvibhūto. Evaṁ tirobhūto. Vinābhūto. Bhavitumanucchavikoti bhabbo. Paribhaviyate soti paribhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_6: Yena kenaci yo pīḷito hīḷito vā, so paribhūto. Gamyamānattho yathākāmacārī.
anya-e0803n4:232_7: Abhibhaviyyate soti abhibhūto. Adhibhaviyate soti adhibhūto. Evaṁ addhabhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_8: Ettha adhisaddena samānattho addhasaddo, ‘‘cakkhu bhikkhave addhabhūtaṁ, rūpā addhabhūtā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ addhabhūta’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ, tathā ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṁ attānaṁ na addhabhāvetī’’ti padampi.
anya-e0803n4:232_10: Dukkhena anadhibhūto nāma manussattabhāvo vuccati, taṁ na addhabhāveti nābhibhavatīti suttapadattho.
anya-e0803n4:233_0: Anubhaviyate soti anubhūto. Evaṁ samanubhūto. Paccanubhūto. Bhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:233_1: Ettha bhāvitoti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito’’tiādīsu guṇīvācakaṁ padhānapadaṁ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:233_4: Tatra bhāvitā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā, te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho. Sambhāviyate soti sambhāvito. Evaṁ vibhāvito. Paribhāvito. Anuparibhūto.
anya-e0803n4:233_6: Ettha manaṁparibhūtoti īsakaṁ appattaparibhavano vuccati. Mananti hi nipātapadaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:233_7: ‘‘Atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūlito, devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṁ nāsito, manaṁ vuḷho ahosī’’tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:235_0: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n4:236_2: Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati ‘‘aladdhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ laddhabbaṁ labhanīyaṁ laddhuṁ vā sakkuṇeyya’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_5: Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati ‘‘parisakkuṇeyyaṁ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_6: Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa atthibhāve ‘‘khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:236_9: Bhamānoti bhavatīti bhamāno, majjhe vakāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Atridaṁ vattabbaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:237_0: ‘‘Kiṁ so bhamāno saccako’’, iccatra pāḷiyaṁ pana;
anya-e0803n4:239_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘kiṁ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto, yo bhagavato vādaṁ āropessatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:239_3: ‘‘Sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṁ vase’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:239_4: Yasmā panimāni ‘‘bhavamāno’’tiādīni vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā saramāno rodati, gacchanto gaṇhāti, ‘‘gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasa accutaṁ isi’’ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n4:239_5: ‘‘Saramāno gacchanto’’tiādīni hi ‘‘yāto gato patto’’tiādīhi sadisāni na honti, uttarakriyāpadāpekkhakāni honti tvāpaccayantapadāni viyāti.
anya-e0803n4:240_0: Paribhaviyamānoti paribhaviyate soti paribhaviyamāno. Evaṁ paribhuyyamānotiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n4:240_1: Imānipi vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā ‘‘rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṁ cintesī’’tiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṁ gavesati.
anya-e0803n4:240_4: Ayaṁ aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṁ niddeso.
anya-e0803n4:240_5: Iccevaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:241_0: Idāni itthiliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhāvikāti bhāvetīti bhāvikā.
anya-e0803n4:241_2: Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṁ āsevanā bahulīkāro.
anya-e0803n4:241_6: Paribhāvanāti vāsanā, samantato vā vaḍḍhanā. Ākārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:242_0: Bhūmīti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhūmi, atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi. Bhūmi vuccati pathavī.
anya-e0803n4:242_1: ‘‘Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā’’tiādīsu pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:242_2: Yā panandhabālamahājanena viññātā pathavī, tassimāni abhidhānāni –
anya-e0803n4:243_0: ‘‘Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n4:244_0: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n4:245_0: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā’’iti.
anya-e0803n4:246_0: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n4:248_0: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n4:249_1: Vibhūtīti vināso, visesato bhavanaṁ vā, atha vā visesato bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti, sampattiyeva, ‘‘rañño vibhūti.
anya-e0803n4:249_2: Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ikārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:250_1: Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati, bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati cāti bhūrī, atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī.
anya-e0803n4:250_2: Pathavīnissitā hi sattā pathaviyaṁyeva ramanti, tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:250_4: Apica bhūrī viyāti bhūrī, paññā, bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya paññāya nāmaṁ, ‘‘yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_5: Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī, paññāyetaṁ nāmaṁ, ‘‘bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_6: Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī, rāgādiarayo abhibhavatītipi bhūrī.
anya-e0803n4:250_7: Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṁ ‘‘rāgaṁ abhibhūyatīti bhūrī, paññā.
anya-e0803n4:250_8: Dosaṁ mohaṁ…pe… rāgo ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso.
anya-e0803n4:250_9: Moho…pe… sabbe bhavagāmino kammā ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā’’.
anya-e0803n4:250_10: Ettha pana ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti padamiva ‘‘aribhū’’ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṁ pubbanipātaṁ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_11: Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā labbhantiyeva, nākhyātikapadesūti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:258_0: Ñāṇaṁ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n4:259_0: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṁ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n4:260_0: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṁ, nepakkaṁ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n4:261_0: Vīmaṁsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n4:275_1: Yathā hi petassa bhariyā ‘‘petī’’ti vuccati, evameva bhūtassa bhariyā ‘‘bhūtī’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:275_2: Bhotīti yāya saddhiṁ kathentena sā itthī ‘‘bhotī’’ iti vattabbā, tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_3: Yathā hi purisena saddhiṁ kathentena puriso ‘‘bhavaṁ’’ iti vohariyati, evameva itthiyā saddhiṁ kathentena itthī ‘‘bhotī’’iti vohariyati.
anya-e0803n4:275_4: ‘‘Kuto nu bhavaṁ bhāradvājo, ime ānesi dārake’’ti, ‘‘ahaṁ bhotiṁ upaṭṭhissaṁ, mā bhotī kupitā ahū’’ti cettha nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_5: Atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo, so ‘‘bhotī’’iti vattabbo, tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n4:275_6: Tathā hi devaputtopi ‘‘devatā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena voharitabbattā devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti voharito, pageva devadhītā.
anya-e0803n4:275_7: Tathā hi ‘‘bhotī carahi jānāti, taṁ me akkhāhi pucchitā’’ti ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato.
anya-e0803n4:275_8: Atrāyaṁ suttapadattho ‘‘yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti, bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki’’nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n4:277_0: Karomi te taṁ vacanaṁ, tvaṁsi ācariyo mamā’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:278_0: Maṭṭhakuṇḍalīvatthusmiṁ pulliṅgayakkhasaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘atthakāmo’’ti pulliṅgavasena itthiliṅgañca devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘hitakāmā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena purisabhūto maṭṭhakuṇḍalī voharito.
anya-e0803n4:279_0: ‘‘Na tvaṁ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṁ vaco’’ti;
anya-e0803n4:281_0: Ettha pana ‘‘ehi bāle khamāpehi, kusarājaṁ mahabbala’’nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena voharitā, tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā bhotī devatā, bhotī silā, bhotī jambū, bhotiṁ devatantiādīhi saddhiṁ paccattavacanādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n4:281_1: Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī itthī, bhotiṁ deva’’ntiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n4:281_2: Vibhāvinīti vibhāvetīti vibhāvinī. Evaṁ paribhāvinītiādīsupi. Īkārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:282_1: Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti bhū. Bhū vuccati pathavī.
anya-e0803n4:282_2: Abhūti vaḍḍhivirahitā kathā, na bhūtapubbāti vā abhū, abhūtapubbā kathā.
anya-e0803n4:282_3: Na bhūtāti vā abhū, abhūtā kathā.
anya-e0803n4:282_4: ‘‘Abhuṁ me kathaṁ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṁ vata bhāsasī’’ti idametesamatthānaṁ sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ūkārantitthiliṅganiddeso. Niyatitthiliṅganiddesoyaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:283_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ pana niyatitthiliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:283_1: Iccevaṁ itthiliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:284_0: Idāni napuṁsakaliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhūtanti catubbidhaṁ pathavīdhātuādikaṁ mahābhūtarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_1: Tañhi aññesaṁ nissayabhāvena bhavatīti bhūtaṁ, bhavati vā tasmiṁ tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_2: Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā.
anya-e0803n4:284_3: Bhūtanti hi napuṁsakavasena sakalo satto evaṁnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:284_5: Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, ujjhāpetvāna bhūtāni, tamhā ṭhānā apakkamī’’ti evamādīsu napuṁsakappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:284_7: Tanna, ‘‘yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṁ gaṇhanti, neva tesaṁ tassa anto, na bahi ṭhānaṁ upalabbhatī’’ti cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyampi bhūtasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattadassanatoti avagantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_9: Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:284_10: Mahantaṁ bhūtanti mahābhūtaṁ, māyākārasaṅkhātena mahābhūtena samantipi mahābhūtaṁ, yakkhādīhi mahābhūtehi samantipi mahābhūtaṁ, mahantehi ghāsacchādanādipaccayehi bhūtaṁ pavattantipi mahābhūtaṁ, mahāvikārabhūtantipi mahābhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:288_0: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n4:290_0: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n4:293_1: Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati, ‘‘janittaṁ me bhavittaṁ me, iti paṅke avassayi’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:296_1: ‘‘Ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā’’ti, ‘‘bhūnahaccaṁ kataṁ mayā’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_1: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi cāti bhavanaṁ vuccati geho, ‘‘pettikaṁ bhavanaṁ mamā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_2: ‘‘Geho gharañca āvāso, bhavanañca niketana’’nti idaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_6: Pātubhavananti pākaṭatā sarūpalābho iccevattho. Āvibhavananti paccakkhabhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:297_7: Tirobhavananti paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhavananti vinābhāvo. Sotthibhavananti suvatthitā.
anya-e0803n4:297_8: Paribhavananti pīḷanā hīḷanā vā. Abhibhavananti vidhamanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:298_0: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṁ cittaṁ vā ñāṇaṁ vā kulaṁ vā atthavibhāvi. Evaṁ dhammavibhāvi.
anya-e0803n4:299_1: Tañhi kāmāvacaragottamabhibhavati, mahaggatagottañca bhāveti nibbattetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:299_2: Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṁ maggavīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:299_3: Tesu hi paṭhamaṁ puthujjanagottamabhibhavati, ariyagottañca bhāveti, gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati, dutiyaṁ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṁ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati. Idaṁ pāḷivavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:304_0: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṁ tu, napuṁsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n4:305_0: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n4:306_0: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṁ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n4:308_0: Cittena saha bhavatīti cittasahabhu, cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:309_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyatanapuṁsakaliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:309_1: Iccevaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:314_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
